Constructor & Destructor Documentation

stVPNode::stVPNode (  stPage *  page,
bool  create = false
) 
 

Creates a new instance of this class. The parameter page is an instance of stPage that hold the node data.

The parameter create tells to stPage what operation will be performed. True means that the page will be initialized and false means that the page will be used just as it is. The default value is false.

Parameters:
page The page that hold the data of this node.
create The operation to be performed.

Member Function Documentation

bool stVPNode::AddEntry (  stSize  size,
const stByte *  object
) 
 

This method adds an object to this node.

Parameters:
size The size of the object in bytes.
object The object data.
Returns:
The position in the vector Entries or a negative value for failure.

const stByte* stVPNode::GetObject (   ) 
 

Gets the serialized object. Use GetObjectSize to determine the size of the object.

Parameters:
id The id of the entry.
Warning:
The parameter id is not verified by this implementation unless __stDEBUG__ is defined at compile time.
Returns:
A pointer to the serialized object.
See also:
GetObjectSize()
